::DrillBit::

DrillBit was staying quiet, and listening to everyone. He would have
killed the cruel commander that Land Mine and Time Bomb had.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was standing outside the Ark, when a rush of power went through
his body. He relized that the Maximal Matrix within him, had recharged.
He was now Rodimus Prime. Then a thought came to mind. In his last body,
there was no differance between Hot Rod and Rodimus. In this body he was
taller, and his alternate mode must have changed too. He wouldn't be
able to hide the existance of the new Matrix from the Preds anymore.

OOC: To anyone who updates the site, do not change the member, and
character page to be Rodimus, leave it Hot Rod. And to anyone who wants
to bicker, there are several places to do it besides the RPG board.
There is:

1)The EGROUPS NBWRPG chat room. 2)The main sites chat room. 3)The main
sites message board. 4)And the message board on the RPG's "backup" YAHOO
club.
